title: Captivating and a little distribing
review:
This is a creative yet somewhat Dark Musical. Could be about ten minutes shorter and then I would have rated it a 10.

All in all I recommended not missing Tommy Silver.

iamtommysilver

title: Dream sweet Dreams Tommy Boy, But please do come back soon (for a sequel)!
review:
This film is a masterpiece that will stay with you long and keep you warm until you too become Tommy Silver.

I had the pleasure of seeing this film late last night and am blown the hell away. It is so brilliant!! It captures the most amazing moments.. of innocence and first love ..in such a wonderful and adorable way. It echos traces of pure imaginative delight and each line of every song has hidden depth beyond just for eccentricity's sake.

Thank you, Luke Shirock! Thank you so much for being so cool and bringing tears to my face.
